content:
A black graphic tee from H&M will look great with your distressed denim jeans. Since you've already purchased the jeans from H&M, you know the fit will be comfortable, and the quality is usually on point.

A simple design with a funny slogan is a great way to add some personality to your outfit. It's a fantastic way to express yourself and showcase your sense of humor. Plus, it's a great conversation starter!

Here are some tips to keep in mind when shopping for a graphic tee with a funny slogan:

**Tips for Choosing a Funny Slogan:**

1. **Know Your Humor**: Choose a slogan that resonates with your sense of humor. If you're a fan of sarcasm, look for tees with witty one-liners. If you love puns, find a tee with a clever play on words.
2. **Keep it Simple**: A simple design with a funny slogan is usually more effective than a busy design with too much going on.
3. **Consider Your Audience**: Think about where you'll be wearing the tee. If you're planning to wear it to a more formal occasion, you may want to opt for a more subtle design.

When you're browsing through H&M's selection, take your time, and have fun! Read through the slogans, and see what makes you laugh or smile. You might even find a tee that becomes your new favorite.

Remember, fashion is all about expressing yourself and having fun. Don't be afraid to try out new combinations and experiment with different styles. You got this!

If you need any more advice or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping, and I hope you find the perfect graphic tee to pair with your distressed denim jeans!
